entry.title: Tahoe Leather Noseband - USA Leather
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Nosebands and Accessories
Price: 27.95

This leather noseband is made with 100% USA leather. It is double layered and double stitched. Hardware is stainless steel.

  •  Double stitched and double layered for durability
  •  Hard to find London Tan color

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Silver Texas Star Padded Leather Western Horse Noseband
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Nosebands and Accessories
Price: 29.95

Tahoe Tack’s Silver Texas Star Padded Leather Western Horse Noseband is an attractive new Medium Oil leather noseband that is a part of the Texas Star series. This new noseband features a flashy engraved 1” Texas Star concho on either side of the noseband, as well as attractive stainless steel show spots covering the entire nose of the noseband. This noseband was designed to fit most horses weighing between 1,000-1,250 lbs and has a 33” noseband, and 37” - 43” crown. Tahoe Tack’s Silver Texas Star collection also includes matching tack pieces such as a browband headstall, slip ear headstall, split reins, breast collar, and spur straps.


  • PART OF THE TEXAS STAR COLLECTION - this noseband is part of Tahoe Tack’s new Texas Star collection, which is composed of matching Medium Oil leather tack pieces featuring Texas Star conchos and stainless steel show spots.
  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST HORSES - this noseband was designed to fit most horses weighing between 1,000-1,250 lbs and has a 33” noseband, and 37” - 43” crown.
  • SPOTTED TEXAS STAR DESIGN - this noseband features flashy engraved 1” Texas Star conchos on either side of the nose, as well as attractive stainless steel show spots covering the entire nose of the noseband.
  • PADDED NOSEBAND FOR INCREASED COMFORT - our nosebands feature soft leather padding on the underside of the noseband to increase your horse’s comfort during use and promote a healthy fur coat.
  • ONE YEAR WARRANTY - this product comes with a one-year limited manufacturer’s warranty that protects against quality issues and defects. To register your product, visit the manufacturer Derby Originals' website.


Measurements:

Noseband: 33”

Crown: 37” - 43”

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Starry Night Black Padded Leather Western Horse Noseband
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Nosebands and Accessories
Price: 32.95

Tahoe Tack's Starry Night Padded Leather Western Noseband for Horses is the latest installment in our Starry Night tack series. This series features attractive black leather tack with double-stitching and stainless steel show spotting adornments that are ideal for everything from everyday riding to the show ring. Our Starry Night noseband is designed to fit most horses weighing between 1,000-1,250 lbs and has a 33” noseband and 37” - 43” crown. These nosebands are easy to adjust to fit your horse. Be sure to check out Tahoe Tack's matching Starry Night headstall and breast collar!


  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST HORSES - these nosebands are designed to fit most horses weighing between 1,000-1,250 lbs and have a 33” noseband, and 37” - 43” crown.
  • PREMIUM LEATHER CONSTRUCTION - these nylon Western nosebands are made from leather, which is durable and long-lasting with proper care, easy to maintain, and comfortable for your horse to wear.
  • PADDED NOSEBAND FOR INCREASED COMFORT - our nosebands feature soft leather padding on the underside of the noseband to increase your horse’s comfort during use and promote a healthy fur coat.
  • STAINLESS STEEL SHOW SPOTTING - our Starry Night noseband features a line of flashy and attractive stainless steel show spots covering the entire nose, which adds flair and style.
  • DESIGNED FOR USE WITH A TIE-DOWN - this Western noseband has been designed for use with a tie down and features a sturdy nickel-plated o-ring at the bottom of the noseband that is designed to universally fit any tie down.

Measurements:

Noseband: 33”

Crown: 37” - 43”

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Patterned Nylon Padded Western Noseband for Horses Available in Six Colors
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Nosebands and Accessories
Price: 19.95

Tahoe Tack's Patterned Nylon Padded Western Noseband for Horses was designed to offer a more modern, attractive, and high-quality nylon noseband option compared to your basic, plain, nylon nosebands that are flimsy and unattractive. Our nosebands are available in six attractive patterns so that you can find the option that best suits you and your horse. Our line of patterned nosebands is designed to fit most horses weighing between 1,000-1,250 lbs and have a 28” noseband, and 38” - 43” crown. These nosebands are easy to adjust to fit your horse. Be sure to check out Tahoe Tack's matching nylon overlay browband headstalls, slip ear headstalls, halters. bucket straps, and more!


  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST HORSES - these nosebands are designed to fit most horses weighing between 1,000-1,250 lbs and have a 28” noseband and 38” - 43” crown.
  • PREMIUM NYLON CONSTRUCTION - these nylon Western nosebands are made from heavy-duty nylon webbing, which is durable, long-lasting, easy to care for, comfortable for your horse to wear, and resistant to rips or tears.
  • PADDED NOSEBAND FOR INCREASED COMFORT - our nylon nosebands feature soft neoprene padding on the underside of the noseband to increase your horse’s comfort during use and promote a healthy fur coat.
  • FEATURES ATTRACTIVE OVERLAY PRINT - our unique nosebands feature modern and stylish printed designs such as Aztec, Chevron, Paisley, and more on the top of the noseband, which lets them stand out compared to regular plain nylon nosebands.
  • AVAILABLE IN SIX ATTRACTIVE COLORS - our nosebands are available in Blue Aztec on Black nylon, Red Aztec on Red nylon, Blue Chevron on Hurricane Blue nylon, Paisley on Grey nylon, Geometric on Hurricane Blue nylon, and Grey Floral on Hot Pink nylon.


Measurements:

Noseband: 28”

Crown: 38” - 43”

entry.title: Flash Attachment for English Bridles with Connecting Loop
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Nosebands and Accessories
Price: 9.95

A well-designed premium leather adjustable flash for English bridles. Adjusts from 21" to 25" with special loop converts any bridle into a flash bridle. This is an excellent replacement option for torn flash keepers also!
  • Ready for use with any English bridle
  • Stainless steel hardware
  • Made from premium leather by Paris Tack

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Lightweight Padded Nylon Horse Tie Down Noseband - Features Premium Breathable Neoprene Padding
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Nosebands and Accessories
Price: 9.95

This tie-down noseband is made from durable nylon and features soft padding for extra comfort. The adjustable crown is known to fit most full-sized horses. Soft padding placed on the noseband is designed for your horse's comfort.

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE’S COMFORT IN MIND - our premium padded nylon noseband is designed with high-quality nylon that will not rub or irritate your horse’s coat, as well as plush neoprene padding along the noseband to prevent pressure points/rubs.
  • FEATURES PREMIUM HARDWARE - our nylon noseband is made with high quality and durable nickel-plated hardware that is designed to last for many years to come.
  • ADJUSTABLE DESIGN - our noseband is designed to fit most horses weighing 900-1400lbs and has a crown measurement of 38” to 43”, and a noseband circumference of 32”. Our noseband is designed to fit most average-sized horses and breeds.
  • MOISTURE-WICKING NEOPRENE PADDING - our noseband is unique in that we have utilized a padded neoprene noseband that provides cushion and protection while being lightweight, breathable, and moisture-wicking for your horse’s comfort.
  • ACCOMMODATES ANY TIE DOWN - our tiedown noseband features a 1.5” tiedown ring on the noseband that is designed to be universal and be compatible with any brand of tie-down.
